ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T20:21:20 [Issue ID 4000-677234] urn:comicvine:4000-677234 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 02:01:07. [Issue ID 1827081]
ComicInfo.Summary:
You’d think having two Vampblade’s to battle a foe Katie previously defeated would make things easy. But it’s going to take everything they’ve got to survive this Earth’s deadlier, slimier, skeevier Suck Lord!
Features 3 regular and risqué variants, including two covers from Dan Mendoza (Zombie Tramp, DollFace)!!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|----------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------|------------------| | A | Regular Cover | Celor (a) & Jukka Issakainen (c) | 1 | | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Celor (a) & Jukka Issakainen (c) | 2 | | C | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Winston Young (a) & Arnaldo Robles (c) | 3 | | D | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Winston Young (a) & Arnaldo Robles (c) | 4 | | E | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Dan Mendoza | 5 | | F | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Dan Mendoza | 6 |
*Notes* Overall issue #29. The digital edition (7/18/2018) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Title: Down the Vamp Hole Part Four
